pr_title: Support active sync for give list in EMR bootstrap

timeline.bodyText:
nit:

"list of relative paths" can be misleading. I prefer simply "list of paths"
"UFS metadata will be periodically syncing to Alluxio namespace." to "UFS metadata will be periodically synced with the Alluxio namespace."

replies.bodyText: list of paths could also hard to understand, it's the relative path of the given root ufs.  List of alluxio paths after mounting the given root UFS?
replies.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: i don''t get what you're trying to say here. "list of Alluxio paths" is good. where does relative come from? relative from root is an absolute path; these paths don't have to be a mount point, it can be any alluxio path. i'm fine with whatever you choose
replies.author: madanadit

replies.bodyText: ok got it. What i mean is if root ufs is hdfs:///a/ which is mounted to alluxio root, the list to sync is hdfs:///a/b, then they should provide /b path. Alluxio path is definitely more clear. Thanks
